attributes.action: Cancel day light saving to help people with their electricity bills.
attributes.additional_details: It’s time to cancel this action as nothing is gained by moving an hour back and forth. Something from the war to help farmers but farmers work all hours of the day and it’s mostly mechanised. Let’s move into the current century instead of operating in the last one. People need help with energy costs now.
attributes.background: Cancel day light saving to help people with their electricity bills. People will have an extra hour of daylight which would mean less electric being used, especially with the current price rises.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612319
